text:
(1)
First Avenue, east side, north from 59th Street; seen through
the arch of the Queensboro Bridge approach.
A boy is stealing a ride on a north-bound street car of the Second Avenue line. At the time of this picture, this line is about to be discontinued and replaced by bus service.
March 5, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, showing a south-bound street car.
March 5, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.
